rows.label: tev000492_MSG0001
rows.name:
Good morning to you, [ST:playername ].
I'm pleased to see you awake and hard at work at this
earliest of hours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0002
rows.name: Were you just passing by?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0003
rows.name:
As you can see, I'm performing an inspection of the
integrated production plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000492_SEL0011
rows.name: Clarify whether or not H.B. is a Mediator.

rows.label: tev000492_JNK0020
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: tev000492_SEL0021
rows.name: Commend H.B. for doing BLADE HQ's job.

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0004
rows.name:
I see you've learned nothing from our last encounter.
And I grow weary of having to remind the likes of you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0005
rows.name: Once again, I am a Pathfinder. Path. Finder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0006
rows.name:
Truly, your powers of perception place you among
BLADE's elite![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0007
rows.name:
I heard that since the xenoforms arrived here in NLA,
the integrated production plant has been running at
full capacity, day and night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0008
rows.name:
If any sort of trouble were to occur here, it would be
a serious setback for BLADE, the civilians of New LA,
and the xenoforms alike.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0009
rows.name:
It's when you're at your busiest that you're most likely
to miss the early signs of trouble, so I figured the plant
could benefit from a third-party inspection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0010
rows.name: And that is what brings me here today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_JNK0030
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: tev000492_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell H.B. that the plant is in no immediate danger.

rows.label: tev000492_JNK0040
rows.name: Cooperate

rows.label: tev000492_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask H.B. if there's anything you can do to help.

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0011
rows.name: I agreeâ€”I've found nothing of serious concern.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0012
rows.name:
The plant is being run by professionals, and my fears
appear to be wholly unfounded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0013
rows.name:
Outside of an abrupt 2,000 percent increase in pizza
requests, the plant faces no significant challenges.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0014
rows.name: I am grateful for your offer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0015
rows.name:
However, your assistance is not needed at this time.
I fear this inspection has been a waste of my own
considerable talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0016
rows.name:
The plant is well-run, and the staff's most pressing
problem is an abrupt 2,000 percent increase in pizza
requests.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0017
rows.name:
And by de-prioritizing lower-demand items, the staff
has managed to increase their pizza production without
significant disruptions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0018
rows.name:
Now if you'll excuse me, I must report my findings
to HQ.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0019
rows.name:
I am pleased to see you faring well, but do not let
complacency be your undoing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000492_MSG0020
rows.name: I hope we can work together again soon.[ST:wait ]
